LandingPage.introParagraph1: Sharetribe Flex is the fastest and most affordable way to set up a powerful marketplace platform that is uniquely yours.
LandingPage.introParagraph2: To see what features we are building or planning to build, see the
LandingPage.introduction.title: Introduction to Flex
LandingPage.introduction.description: Learn if Sharetribe Flex is the right choice for you, what development skills are needed, and how you can get the most out of Flex’s APIs and templates.
LandingPage.tutorial.title: Tutorial
LandingPage.tutorial.description: A step-by-step tutorial to help you build a fully functional marketplace and learn about all the key features of Flex.
LandingPage.background.title: Background
LandingPage.background.description: Explanations for important concepts and background information about the design decisions behind Flex.
LandingPage.designToolkit.title: Flex Design Toolkit
LandingPage.designToolkit.description: Understand the best practises of designing for Flex. Take the design toolkit for Flex into use to find an easy way to communicate your ideas forward.
LandingPage.bestPicks.heading: Looking for these?
LandingPage.bestPicks.description: Popular articles and guides to making the most common customizations.

ArticleIndexPage.introduction.title: Introduction to Flex
ArticleIndexPage.introduction.descriptio: Get started in learning about Sharetribe Flex
ArticleIndexPage.tutorial.title: Tutorial
ArticleIndexPage.tutorial.description: This tutorial is designed for people who prefer to learn by doing. We start customizing FTW-daily Git repository, which is a template app to build your own client app that can interact with Flex APIs.
ArticleIndexPage.background.title: All Background articles
ArticleIndexPage.background.description: Explanations and background information for important concepts and design decisions behind the platform.
ArticleIndexPage.cookbook.title: All Cookbook articles
ArticleIndexPage.cookbook.description: Articles that help you to create custom features on top of Flex APIs.
ArticleIndexPage.design-toolkit.title: Design Toolkit
ArticleIndexPage.design-toolkit.descript: The Design Toolkit provides you with the tools to plan and design your custom marketplace. All Flex Templates for Web (FTW) designs and wireframes are included as Sketch files in both mobile and web layouts. The Toolkit also includes a comprehensive guide to understanding your users’ needs through user journeys. These resources provide an excellent starting point for building your unique marketplace on top of Sharetribe Flex.
ArticleIndexPage.ftw.title: Flex Templates for Web articles
ArticleIndexPage.ftw.description: Articles that help you to understand how Flex Templates for Web (FTW) works.
ArticleIndexPage.integrations.title: Integrations
ArticleIndexPage.integrations.descriptio: Articles that help you to understand how to deal with integrations.
